ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Long downtime?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... *In his geriatric voice* When I was young, we had to wait DAYS for the patch!  During prime time!  In the rain (which you couldn t see through because the
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:51 PM 11/7/2001 -0500, you wrote:
>Another hour of my life wasted waiting for EQ to come back online... yet is
>EQ a waste of life anyhow? btw its noon PST they said they would be done at
>10am... oh well... the joys of EQ


*In his geriatric voice*
"When I was young, we had to wait DAYS for the patch! During prime
time! In the rain (which you couldn't see through because the clip-plane
was broken!) Uphill. Both ways. With no SoW! And for what? Sure we had
zones - two of 'em. In black and white. And only one mob. The mangy
rat. People camped that rat for hours, and every kill-stole from everyone
else. Not that it mattered. The rat only had 1 copper for loot. And since
everything cost at least a platinum, nobody could afford any good
equipment. Not that there was any good equipment - just a rusty sword and
a moss-covered twig...."

*snicker*
